title: Ramada Ajman marks Wyndham Worldwide Green Day
text:
(MENAFN Press) In keeping with its green initiatives, Ramada Hotel & Suites Ajman observed Wyndham Worldwide Green Day with a series of activities aimed at reducing carbon footprint. 
Highlighting a "Living Plastic Free" campaign, the hotel encouraged the staff and guests to eliminate the use of plastic products. The activities include the distribution of recyclable bags made of nonwoven fabric by the laundry department, and providing reward to the staff with the most creative use of plastic alternative. The management also shared tips and information on how to reduce plastic consumption including a "Bring Your Own Bag" approach when shopping, and using mugs or metal tumblers instead of plastic bottles, among others. 
Ramada Ajman will also conduct a consumption analysis report on plastic usage, alongside a waste audit, on how they were able to reduce the percentage of plastic products after the steps taken. On top of the "Living Plastic Free" drive, Ramada Hotel and Suites Ajman planted more trees in its urban farm, which can also aid in the goal of carbon footprint reduction. 

Iftikhar Hamdani, General Manager, Ramada Hotel and Suites Ajman, "We fully support Wyndham's Green initiatives, as our hotel has been very active in these types of activities over the past years. Our collective efforts on reducing plastic usage can help make a difference and these steps should be carried out not just on special events like this; we all should make this a mindset and a habit." 

About Ramada Hotel and Suites Ajman 
Ramada Hotel and Suites Ajman is the premier accommodation at the heart of UAE's emirate on the rise. Conveniently located along Sheikh Khalifa bin Zayed, the hotel provides easy access to the UAE's main airports, commercial centres and cultural attractions. With its spacious and stylish accommodation, Ramada Hotel and Suites Ajman caters to both business and leisure travellers, whether on short trips or long-term stays. The hotel offers modern comforts matched with unparalleled service. Guests can enjoy sumptuous food selection at Orchid Restaurant, R Cafe and the 24-hour room service, as well as the hotel's first-rate facilities including a gym, indoor swimming pool, spa, and free access to its exclusive beach club.
